Bareminerals Pureness Gel Cleanser

Brand: Bareminerals

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA/EAU), SODIUM COCOYL ISETHIONATE, GLYCERIN, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, STEARIC ACID, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, GLYCERYL STEARATE SE, PHENOXYETHANOL, XANTHAN GUM, OPUNTIA VULGARIS EXTRACT, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) FRUIT JUICE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, GLYCERYL POLYACRYLATE, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
